name: Red Rock Resorts, Inc.
description: Red Rock Resorts, Inc. is a leading gaming and hospitality company based in Las Vegas, Nevada, specializing in the ownership and operation of casinos and entertainment resorts. Founded in 2006, Red Rock Resorts owns and operates several properties including the popular Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa, which offers a luxurious gaming experience alongside high-end dining, entertainment, and spa services. The company focuses on providing a unique and immersive experience to its guests, with a commitment to quality service and exceptional amenities. Red Rock Resorts primarily targets the local Las Vegas market, serving both residents and visitors with a range of gaming options, hotel accommodations, and recreational activities. The company also emphasizes corporate social responsibility, contributing to the local community through various philanthropic efforts and initiatives. With a strong portfolio of properties and a strategic growth plan, Red Rock Resorts continues to enhance its position in the competitive gaming industry, adapting to changing consumer preferences and expanding its offerings to include new entertainment and dining options.

seo.meta_title: Red Rock Resorts, Inc. | Premier Gaming and Hospitality in Las Vegas
seo.meta_description: Explore Red Rock Resorts, Inc., a leader in the gaming and hospitality industry. Discover our luxurious resorts, gaming options, and commitment to exceptional service.

faq.question: What does Red Rock Resorts do?
faq.answer: Red Rock Resorts operates casinos and resorts, providing gaming, dining, and entertainment experiences.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Red Rock Resorts?
faq.answer: Frank J. Fertitta III is the CEO of Red Rock Resorts, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Red Rock Resorts headquartered?
faq.answer: Red Rock Resorts is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

faq.question: What properties does Red Rock Resorts own?
faq.answer: Red Rock Resorts owns several properties, including Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa.

faq.question: When was Red Rock Resorts founded?
faq.answer: Red Rock Resorts was founded in 2006.
